Elder Filaur:
May the blessings of the rich earth be with you. Welcome to the House of Elders, my dear young Dwarf. I am Filaur, the representative of the glorious Grey Column Guild. I am a member of the senior GuildAssociation, who rule the kingdom in the name of the King of Dwarves, who will return someday.
